charges.charge_description: 21:841 (a)(1) and 841 (b)(1)(C) DISTRIBUTION AND POSSESSION WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE LESS THAN 5 GRAMS OF A MIXTURE AND SUBSTANCE CONTAINING A DETECTABLE AMOUNT OF COCAINE BASE, IN THE FORM COMMONLY KNOWN AS CRACK(1-4)

charges.charge_disposition: 151 months incarceration and three (3) years of supervised release, with conditions, imposed at each count, with all terms running concurrently; No fine or costs; Special assessment of $100.00 imposed at each count

charges.charge_description: 21:841 (a)(1) and 841 (b)(1)(B)(iii) POSSESSION WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE 5 GRAMS OR MORE OF A MIXTURE AND SUBSTANCE CONTAINING A DETECTABLE AMOUNT OF COCAINE BASE, IN THE FORM COMMONLY KNOWN AS CRACK(5)

charges.charge_disposition: 151 months incarceration and three (3) years of supervised release, with conditions, imposed at each count, with all terms running concurrently; No fine or costs; Special assessment of $100.00 imposed at each count
